name: NEHotspotHS20Settings
desc: Settings for configuring Hotspot 2.0 Wi-Fi networks.

items.name: init(domainName: String, roamingEnabled: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a new hotspot configuration of a legacy Hotspot or HS 2.0 Wi-Fi network. with optional roaming enabled.

items.name: var domainName: String
items.desc: The domain name of a Hotspot 2.0 Wi-Fi Network.

items.name: var isRoamingEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether or not roaming is enabled on a Hotspot 2.0 Wi-Fi network.

items.name: var mccAndMNCs: [String]
items.desc: An array of Mobile Country Code (MCC) and Mobile Network Code (MNC) pairs used for Wi-Fi Hotspot 2.0 negotiation.

items.name: var naiRealmNames: [String]
items.desc: An array of Network Access Identifier (NAI) realm name strings used for Wi-Fi Hotspot 2.0 negotiation.

items.name: var roamingConsortiumOIs: [String]
items.desc: An array of Roaming Consortium Organization (RCO) identifiers used for Wi-Fi Hotspot 2.0 negotiation.
